title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: Description: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value. Steps to reproduce:  1. Set a default value for a list box in the report parameter.  2. Modify the default value.  3. Observe that the modified default value is lost.
OB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
SR:
1. Set a default value for a list box in the report parameter
2. Modify the default value
3. Observe that the modified default value is lost.
